RNS Number : 4145XLaw Debenture Corp PLC04 January 2022

The Law Debenture Corporation p.l.c.

Net Asset Value as at 31 December 2021

The Law Debenture Corporation p.l.c. announces that its Net Asset Value ("NAV") with borrowings at par and including the fair value of IPS business 1 on 31 December 2021 was 821.12 pence per share (cum income). With the Corporation's long term debt stated at fair value, the NAV was 780.09 pence per share (cum income). The mid-market price at the close of business on 31 December 2021 was 799.00 pence per share.
